scenario_text.value: Hey Takuma. What’s up?

Oh, nothing much. I was just out for a walk.
Hey, how were things that month I was gone?
Well...a lot happened.

Somehow we managed to avoid any casualties,
but that was kind of a miracle.

(Kaito doesn’t go into too much detail, but
it sounds like things were really hard.)
And lately Miu’s been kind of on edge...

It’s like she’s been avoiding me, even though
I’m the only one who can keep her safe.
Man, if only I had things more together...
I know... You can still get stronger, right?

I can’t say for sure, but I think that
depends on you.

It depends on me, huh? Then I know what
I need to do!

(Kaito seems lost in his own thoughts. I just
hope what he intends to do isn’t dangerous.)
(What should I say to him right now?)
What am I most concerned about?
Don’t be a sacrifice.
Don’t go too far.
I’ll talk to Miu too.

Kaito, you’re not thinking of giving up your
life for her, are you?

If I wasn’t prepared to do that, we’d never
have made it through this past month.
Kaito...

Haha, no need to freak out like that. Don’t
worry, Takuma, it’s not like I want to die.

After all, no sister wants to lose her big
brother.

Kaito, I want you to promise me that you
won’t go too far, okay?

Yeah, I got it. But if the worst should
happen, take care of Miu, okay?

I’m sorry, but I don’t think I can promise
that.
What?

If the worst does happen, I don’t think I’ll
be able to do anything to make Miu less sad.
Yeah...I guess you’re right.

The important thing is that you keep holding
on.
Keep holding on, huh?

Listen, about Miu, I’ll try talking to her
too...
Right, that would be good. Thanks.

Whenever I try, I get so mad I end up saying
something dumb.

Kaito...just don’t go getting any crazy
ideas, okay?

If you’re really thinking of Miu, you won’t
go too far, right?

Right, I know. That would be for Miu’s sake
too, I guess...
